druidsurv:DartMonkeyTwins.NAME: Dart Monkey Twins
druidsurv:DartMonkeyTwins.DESCRIPTION: #yDartkind. Deal !D! damage, add two Dart Monkey Twin to your hand. Exhaust.

druidsurv:GlaiveRicochet.NAME: Glaive Ricochet
druidsurv:GlaiveRicochet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and deal !druidsurv:sd! damage to ALL OTHER enemies, !M! times

druidsurv:BlueBloon.NAME: Blue Bloon
druidsurv:BlueBloon.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B!X Block. Deal !D! damage at the end of your next turn.

druidsurv:Boomerang.NAME: Boomerang Monkey
druidsurv:Boomerang.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and deal !druidsurv:sd! damage to another enemy.

druidsurv:Mortar.NAME: Mortar Monkey
druidsurv:Mortar.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

druidsurv:SpicyMortar.NAME: Burny Stuff Mortar
druidsurv:SpicyMortar.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. It is set #y${modID}:On_Fire.

druidsurv:OliveBloon.NAME: Olive Bloon
druidsurv:OliveBloon.DESCRIPTION: #y${modID}:Bloon_Send. Gain !B! Block. Deal !D! damage at the end of your next turn.

druidsurv:PinkBloon.NAME: Pink Bloon
druidsurv:PinkBloon.DESCRIPTION: #y${modID}:Bloon_Send. Gain !B!X Block. Deal !D! damage at the end of your turn.

druidsurv:RedBloon.NAME: Red Bloon
druidsurv:RedBloon.DESCRIPTION: #y${modID}:Bloon_Send. Gain !B!X Block. Deal !D! damage at the end of your next turn.

druidsurv:YellowBloon.NAME: Yellow Bloon
druidsurv:YellowBloon.DESCRIPTION: #y${modID}:Bloon_Send. Gain !B!X Block. NL Deal !D! damage at the end of your next turn.

druidsurv:GreenBloon.NAME: Green Bloon
druidsurv:GreenBloon.DESCRIPTION: #y${modID}:Bloon_Send. Gain !B!X Block. NL Deal !D! damage at the end of your next turn.

druidsurv:UndeadBloon.NAME: Undead Bloon
druidsurv:UndeadBloon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage at the end of your next turn. Exhaust.

druidsurv:CeramicBloon.NAME: Ceramic Bloon
druidsurv:CeramicBloon.DESCRIPTION: #y${modID}:Bloon_Send. Gain !B!X Block. NL Deal !D! damage after 2 turns.

druidsurv:RainbowBloon.NAME: Rainbow Bloon
druidsurv:RainbowBloon.DESCRIPTION: #y${modID}:Bloon_Send. Gain !B!X Block. NL Deal !D! damage at the end of your next turn.

druidsurv:SharpShooter.NAME: Sharp Shooter
druidsurv:SharpShooter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D!*2 damage, then deal !D! damage twice.

druidsurv:Strengthenator.NAME: Strengthenator
druidsurv:Strengthenator.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength at the start of your turn.

druidsurv:StunGasBloon.NAME: Paralysis Gas Bloon
druidsurv:StunGasBloon.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength at the start of your turn.

druidsurv:BloontoniumGasBloon.NAME: Bloontonium Gas Bloon
druidsurv:BloontoniumGasBloon.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M!(X+1) Block when hit. NL (Where X is the cost of this card.)

druidsurv:BloontoniumGasBloonOldIThink.NAME: Energy Gas Bloon
druidsurv:BloontoniumGasBloonOldIThink.DESCRIPTION: Gain 6 Block and Lose 2 Focus. NL Whenever you are attacked, gain [R], until the end of your next turn. Exhaust.

druidsurv:WeakeningGasBloon.NAME: Weakening Gas Bloon
druidsurv:WeakeningGasBloon.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength at the start of your turn.

druidsurv:VolatileBloon.NAME: Volatile Bloon
druidsurv:VolatileBloon.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B!X Block. After taking 20 damage, deal 10 damage to yourself and ALL enemies. Exhaust.

druidsurv:BolsteredBloon.NAME: Volatile Bloon
druidsurv:BolsteredBloon.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and !B! Mana Shield when you play a Bloon this turn. At the end of your turn, lose 2 Dexterity. Exhaust.

druidsurv:BlockCache.NAME: Bloontonium Cache
druidsurv:BlockCache.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B!(X+1) Block. NL (Where X is the cost of this card.) NL Exhaust.

druidsurv:ManaShield.NAME: Mana Shield
druidsurv:ManaShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and !B! Mana Shield. Exhaust.

druidsurv:WizardMonkey.NAME: Wizard Monkey
druidsurv:WizardMonkey.DESCRIPTION: #y${modID}:Prized. Deal !D! damage. At the start of your turn, increase this card's damage by !M! for this combat.

druidsurv:ArchersInstinct.NAME: Archer's Instinct
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card to add into your hand.

druidsurv:NaturesClarity.NAME: Nature's Clarity
druidsurv:NaturesClarity.DESCRIPTION: #yPick 4. NL Gain !M! Mana Shield per [R] cost of picked card
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card to add into your hand.

druidsurv:Divination.NAME: Divination
druidsurv:Divination.DESCRIPTION: #yPick 3. NL If it's a Monkey, gain !M! Strength
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card to add into your hand.

druidsurv:JunglesBounty.NAME: Jungle's Bounty Druid
druidsurv:JunglesBounty.DESCRIPTION: When you gain [R], Heal !M! HP, lose !M! focus, and gain 1 Supported.

druidsurv:DruidCard.NAME: Druid
druidsurv:DruidCard.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP, and gain 1 Supported. NL

druidsurv:FuckYou.NAME: Heart of Vengeance Druid
druidsurv:FuckYou.DESCRIPTION: Add 2 Vengeful Thorn to your hand. When attacked, increase every copy of Vengeful Thorn's damage by !M! this combat.

druidsurv:ExampleTwoAmountPowerCard.NAME: Two Amount Power
druidsurv:ExampleTwoAmountPowerCard.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Strength and !druidsurv:m2! Dexterity.

druidsurv:InlinePowerDemo.NAME: Inline Power
druidsurv:InlinePowerDemo.DESCRIPTION: Strikes deal !M! more damage. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: additional damage. At the end of your turn, gain #b

druidsurv:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.NAME: Cool Card Stuff
druidsurv:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.DESCRIPTION: Choose from 1 of 3 cost 0 cards from any class. NL Add it into your hand. NL It gains Ethereal and Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card to add into your hand with Ethereal and Exhaust.

druidsurv:EasyXCostDemo.NAME: Easy X Cost
druidsurv:EasyXCostDemo.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage X{!M!|>0=+!M!} times. NL Gain X{!M!|>0=+!M!} Strength. NL Exhaust.

druidsurv:EasyModalChoiceDemo.NAME: Easy Modal Choice
druidsurv:EasyModalChoiceDemo.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: Draw !M! cards or gain !druidsurv:m2! Strength.

druidsurv:DrawAndShiv.NAME: Draw and Shiv
druidsurv:DrawAndShiv.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Add 1 *Shiv into your hand.

druidsurv:TwoTypesOfDamage.NAME: Two Damage Values
druidsurv:TwoTypesOfDamage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you're Vulnerable, deal !druidsurv:sd! damage instead.

druidsurv:StartupBlockCard.NAME: Startup And AOE
druidsurv:StartupBlockCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Startup: Gain !M! Block.

druidsurv:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallbac.NAME: Previews and Callbacks
druidsurv:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallbac.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Shuffle *Smite{!Upgrades!|>0=+} and *Safety{!Upgrades!|>0=+} into your draw pile. NL Draw 1 card. NL If it's Colorless, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
